item.title: Katex Math Typesetting
item.description: Enable Katex in the config file by setting the katex param to true. This will import the necessary Katex CSS/JS. Note: Use the online reference of supported TeX functions. Some math: $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887… $$ $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887… $$ More math: $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$ $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$
